howToUpgrade.question: How to upgrade to Professional?
howToUpgrade.answer: Click the 'Upgrade Plan' button, choose your preferred payment plan (monthly or annual), and fill in your payment information to upgrade immediately.

trialPeriod.question: Is there a trial period?
trialPeriod.answer: Yes, we offer a 14-day free trial where you can experience all Professional features.

cancellation.question: Can I cancel anytime?
cancellation.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. After cancellation, you can still use the paid features until the end of your current period.

dataRetention.question: Will my data be deleted after cancellation?
dataRetention.answer: No, your data and question bank will be fully retained and not deleted.
